data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Recently, the company was forced to fire one of its secretaries because he had misused confidential corporate information. The CEO ____ very ____, and ____ everyone ____ on ____ team ____ had ____ to ____ same ____. He ____ relieved ____ hear ____ Bridget, who ____ all ____ the company's ____, that ____ of ____ others ____ involved ____ the ____ leak. Before this incident, the CEO never would have suspected any of his employees would be capable of doing such a thing, but after his investigation into the matter, he was relieved to find that at least it was only one employee who had betrayed the company's trust.
data.partBlankContent: Recently, the company was forced to fire one of its secretaries because he had misused confidential corporate information. The CEO w__ very up___, and quest_____ everyone el__ on t__ team w__ had acc___ to t__ same infor______. He w__ relieved t_ hear fr__ Bridget, who super_____ all o_ the company's secre______, that no__ of t__ others we__ involved i_ the infor______ leak. Before this incident, the CEO never would have suspected any of his employees would be capable of doing such a thing, but after his investigation into the matter, he was relieved to find that at least it was only one employee who had betrayed the company's trust.
data.answer: 最近，公司被迫解雇了一名秘书，因为他滥用公司机密信息。首席执行官非常沮丧，并询问了团队中所有能接触到相同信息的人。当他从监督公司所有秘书处的布里吉特那里听到其他人都没有参与信息泄露时，他松了一口气。在此事件发生之前，CEO从来没有怀疑过他的员工会做出这样的事情，但经过调查后，他松了一口气，发现至少只有一名员工背叛了公司的信任。
